Travelers,

We're holding a Halloween Art Contest on Discord, so come show your talent dear fwends. Rewards ain't candies but they're SHWEEEET!!!<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1319259889848307712 Official Announcement]</ref>

For information on how to participate, visit the Official [https://discord.com/invite/genshinimpact Discord].<br />
==Rules==
* One entry per applicant.
* Entry must be '''ORIGINAL'''!
* Entry should have clearly recognizable Genshin Impact characters/elements and ties in with a Halloween theme.
* Entry must be SFW.
* Selected winners will go through verification by sending a sketch/WIP/draft in order to prove the submission belongs to the rightful owner.
* Entry must be uploaded to Twitter with #GenshinImpact and #GenshinHalloween.

'''<u>Note:</u>''' Winners will be determined by the Discord Staff Team. Creative or funny works have a higher chance of being chosen! Please ensure your Twitter account is SFW. Applicants with NSFW profiles will be disqualified.

==Rewards==
* [[Blessing of the Welkin Moon]] (50 Winners)
* Top 3 Winners will additionally have their works retweeted
